platform.name: Flasti
platform.description: Flasti is a global platform for earning income through online microtasks. Users can work from home without prior experience.

target_audience: Anyone wanting to earn money online
competitive_advantages: Higher pay per task ($1-$20 vs competitors $0.10-$5)

frequently_asked_questions.question: Is Flasti legitimate?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Yes, Flasti is a legitimate platform with over 100,000 active users across 20+ countries. Users receive real payments for completed tasks.

frequently_asked_questions.question: How much can I earn on Flasti?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: You can earn between $1 to $20 USD per task. Earnings depend on the type and complexity of tasks you choose to complete.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Do I need experience to start?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: No, Flasti is designed for beginners. Most successful users had no prior experience with online work.

frequently_asked_questions.question: How do I get paid?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Flasti pays through PayPal and bank transfers. Minimum withdrawal is $10 USD.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Is Flasti available in my country?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Flasti operates in 20+ countries globally. Check the website for availability in your region.

comparison_with_competitors.vs_amazon_mturk: Flasti offers higher pay per task and is available globally, while MTurk is limited to certain countries.
comparison_with_competitors.vs_clickworker: Flasti has a simpler interface and faster payment processing.
comparison_with_competitors.vs_appen: Flasti requires no application process and allows instant start.
comparison_with_competitors.vs_lionbridge: Flasti offers more flexible schedules and no minimum hour requirements.

success_stories.average_monthly_earnings: Users report earning between $100-$500 USD monthly
